_comment_name: Backend package name for the DevOps Dashboard API server
name: devops-dashboard-backend
_comment_main: Entry point file that starts the server
_comment_dependencies: Production dependencies required for the API server

dependencies._comment_express: Web framework for creating REST API endpoints
dependencies._comment_cors: Middleware for handling Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
dependencies._comment_systeminformation: Library for getting real system metrics (CPU, memory, etc.)
dependencies._comment_node-cron: Task scheduler for running periodic data collection

_comment_scripts: NPM scripts for running the server in different modes

scripts._comment_start: Production start command - runs server.js with Node.js
scripts._comment_dev: Development start command - uses nodemon for auto-restart on file changes
